summary.span: The implementation of the key store provider for Windows Certificate Store.

span.span: The implementation of the key store provider for Windows Certificate Store.

summary.span: This class enables using certificates stored in the Windows Certificate Store as column master keys.

span.span: This class enables using certificates stored in the Windows Certificate Store as column master keys.
For details, see [Always Encrypted](/sql/relational-databases/security/encryption/always-encrypted-database-engine).

summary.span: This function must be implemented by the corresponding Key Store providers.

summary.span: This function should use an asymmetric key identified by a key path and verify the masterkey metadata consisting of (masterKeyPath, allowEnclaveComputations, providerName).
